message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Given its worth to you, I propose a purchase price of $1350000. I am confident this offer strikes a balance between reflecting the product's true value and providing you with a favorable deal. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
